snippet: Miller was to have had outpatient surgery on his back Monday in San Diego and was expected to be sidelined until at least January.
lead_paragraph: Miller was to have had outpatient surgery on his back Monday in San Diego and was expected to be sidelined until at least January.

headline.main: Bode Miller to Be Sidelined With Disk Surgery
headline.print_headline: Disk Surgery to Sideline American Bode Miller
